getPattern.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* getPattern.c written: J.Wood April 12, 2006
00002    program to get the current spin or fill pattern from CDEV 
00003    and write output to a text file in a usable format
00004 */
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 #include <stdlib.h>
00007 #include <string.h>
00008 #include <ctype.h>
00009 #define f2cFortran
00010 #include <math.h>
00011 #include <errno.h>
00012 #include <sys/stat.h>
00013 #include <signal.h>
00014 #include <unistd.h>
00015 
00016 typedef struct {
00017     short int cdevFillPattern[360];
00018     short int cdevSpinPattern[360];    
00019 } patternDataStruct;
00020 
00021 patternDataStruct patternData;
00022 
00023 extern void getSpin(int ring);
00024 extern void getFill(int ring);
00025 
00026 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00027 {
00028   int i;
00029   int specRing=-1;    // ring specified by user: 0=yel, 1=blu
00030   int getfill=0;
00031   char defFileS[2][20] = {"currentSpinPat.yel", "currentSpinPat.blu"};
00032   char defFileF[2][20] = {"currentFillPat.yel", "currentFillPat.blu"};
00033   char OutFile[256];
00034   
00035   FILE *fout;
00036 
00037   // get arguments
00038   while ((i = getopt(argc, argv, "hybfo:")) != -1) 
00039     switch(i) {
00040     case 'y':
00041       specRing = 0;
00042       sprintf(OutFile, defFileS[specRing]);
00043       break;
00044     case 'b':
00045       specRing = 1;
00046       sprintf(OutFile, defFileS[specRing]);
00047       break;
00048     case 'f':
00049       if (specRing>=0 && specRing<=1) sprintf(OutFile, defFileF[specRing]);
00050       getfill = 1;
00051       break;
00052     case 'o':
00053       // only if optarg is not NULL 
00054       sprintf(OutFile, optarg);
00055       break;
00056     case 'h':
00057    default:
00058      printf("Read pattern from CDEV, output to file\n");
00059      printf("Usage: ./getPattern -y|b [-options] \n");
00060      printf("Possible options are:\n");
00061      printf("-h -- print this message;\n");
00062      printf("-f -- get FILL pattern, rather than SPIN pattern;\n");
00063      printf("-o <out file> -- specify output file name\n"); 
00064      printf("   default file is %s(.blu) or %s(.blu);\n",defFileS[0], defFileF[0]);
00065      return 1;
00066     }
00067 
00068   if(specRing<0 || specRing>1) {
00069     printf("ERROR: Must specify Yellow (-y) or Blue (-b)\n");
00070     return specRing;
00071   }
00072   
00073   // open output file
00074   fout = fopen(OutFile, "wb");    
00075   if (fout == NULL) {
00076     printf("ERROR: Cannot open output file %s\n", OutFile);
00077     return -1;
00078   }
00079 
00080   // read pattern from CDEV
00081   if(getfill) {
00082     getFill(specRing);
00083     for (i=0;i<120;i++) {
00084       fprintf(fout,"%d ",patternData.cdevFillPattern[3*i]);
00085     }
00086     fprintf(fout,"\n");
00087   } else {
00088     getSpin(specRing);
00089     for (i=0;i<120;i++) {
00090       fprintf(fout,"%d ",patternData.cdevSpinPattern[3*i]);
00091     }
00092     fprintf(fout,"\n");
00093   }
00094   printf("Pattern is written to file %s\n",OutFile);
00095 
00096   fclose(fout);
00097 
00098   return 0;
00099 }
